parameter.name: async
parameter.documentation: When true, queues reindexing for background processing.

parameter.name: outcome
parameter.documentation: OperationOutcome describing the result of the reindex operation.

parameter.name: jobId
parameter.documentation: If async, the background job identifier.

parameter.name: resourcesReindexed
parameter.documentation: If synchronous, number of resources reindexed successfully.

parameter.name: resourcesFailed
parameter.documentation: If synchronous, number of resources that failed reindexing.
